room_title: Escape room "Lost in Space" by Escape Room Zone in Detroit
room_description: For decades, humanity dreamed of setting foot on our latest frontier; Mars. This dream just became a reality. You and your team have prepared for this voyage across the stars for years. You’ll soon learn that getting there is the easy part. Crash-landed and 34 million miles from home, it’s up to you to repair your space shuttle and return home!
